title: TITLE
desc:
Write description here. You can use new line or markdown style. For example,
# THE BIG LETTER
color: Write color code here, like 0xffffff. If not necessary, write null instead of str
author: Write author here. If not necessary, write null instead of str

img.path: img/YOUR/LOCAL/PATH/TO/IMAGE (Only one of path and url at this time.)

fields.name: field1
fields.value: You can use value as description. Also, you can use here as int like field2

title: MINIMUM EXAMPLE
desc: title and desc is necessary. others can be omitted
